summary: Email chain between law firm Sullivan & Cromwell and government regarding a grand jury subpoena to TD Bank N.A. concerning Jeffrey Epstein's accounts. The bank confirms it has no accounts in Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory.

persons.name: Nicolas Bourtin
persons.context: Sends email confirming TD Bank's response to a grand jury subpoena regarding Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Gillian P. Seaman
persons.context: Copied on email regarding TD Bank's response to grand jury subpoena concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of grand jury subpoena to TD Bank N.A. regarding accounts in his name or for which he was a signatory.

connections.description: Both are legal professionals copied on correspondence regarding a grand jury subpoena related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Bourtin's law firm is communicating with government regarding a subpoena concerning Epstein's financial accounts.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena to TD Bank
events.description: Grand jury issues subpoena to TD Bank N.A. regarding accounts in Jeffrey Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory.

events.title: TD Bank Response Confirmation
events.description: Law firm confirms TD Bank has no accounts in Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory, in response to grand jury subpoena.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to TD Bank N.A. on October 3, 2019, seeking information about accounts related to Jeffrey Epstein.
TD Bank confirmed it neither has nor had any accounts in Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory.
The communication is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED' and involves legal professionals from Sullivan & Cromwell.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing financial investigation into Epstein's affairs following his 2019 arrest and death.
